meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular time or instance of an event.

examples.sentence: We celebrate this special [occasion] every year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們每年都慶祝這個特別的時刻。

examples.sentence: On this [occasion], I would like to thank everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在這個場合，我想感謝每一個人。

examples.sentence: It was a joyful [occasion] for all of us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這對我們所有人來說都是一個快樂的時刻。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person harmed, injured, or killed as a result of a crime, accident, or other event.

examples.sentence: The police interviewed the [victim] to gather more information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 警方訪問了受害者以收集更多資訊。

examples.sentence: He was a [victim] of identity theft.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是身份盜竊的受害者。

examples.sentence: The organization helps [victims] of domestic abuse.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該組織幫助家庭暴力的受害者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A long, sturdy piece of squared timber or metal.

examples.sentence: The old house has wooden [beams] across the ceiling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老房子天花板上有木梁

examples.sentence: They built a new [beam] to support the roof.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們建造了一根新的梁以支撐屋頂

examples.sentence: The sun's light created a warm [beam] through the window.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 陽光透過窗戶形成了一束溫暖的光束

meanings.meaning_en_US: To one side; out of the way.

examples.sentence: She stepped [aside] to let him pass.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她讓開一步讓他通過。

examples.sentence: Please put your doubts [aside] and trust the process.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把你的疑慮放在一旁，相信這個過程。

examples.sentence: He moved [aside] to avoid being hit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他移開身子以避免被撞。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To follow or discover the course or development of something.

examples.sentence: The detective managed to [trace] the missing person.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 偵探設法追蹤到失蹤的人。

examples.sentence: You can [trace] your ancestry back for generations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以追溯你的祖先幾代。

examples.sentence: She used a pencil to [trace] the outline of the picture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用鉛筆勾勒出圖片的輪廓。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who takes photographs professionally or as a hobby.

examples.sentence: The [photographer] captured beautiful moments at the wedding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 攝影師在婚禮上捕捉到了美麗的瞬間。

examples.sentence: She works as a freelance [photographer].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一名自由攝影師。

examples.sentence: The [photographer] is known for his landscape photos.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位攝影師因其風景照片而聞名。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To give someone facts or information; to tell.

examples.sentence: Please [inform] me of any changes to the schedule.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請告知我任何變更的時間表。

examples.sentence: The teacher will [inform] us about the new project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師會告訴我們有關新項目的事宜。

examples.sentence: They [inform] the public about safety measures.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們告知公眾有關安全措施。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make something known publicly or officially.

examples.sentence: They will [announce] the winner of the contest tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們明天會公告比賽的獲勝者

examples.sentence: The company [announced] a new product line this week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司本週公告了新的產品線

examples.sentence: She will [announce] her retirement at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會在會議上公告她的退休

meanings.meaning_en_US: An arrangement to do something or go somewhere at a fixed time.

examples.sentence: They announced their [engagement] at the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在派對上宣布了他們的訂婚。

examples.sentence: He has an important [engagement] later this evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他今晚稍晚有一個重要的約會。

examples.sentence: The [engagement] will be celebrated with a dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次訂婚將以晚餐慶祝。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having an uneven or irregular surface; not smooth.

examples.sentence: The surface of the table was [rough] to the touch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 桌子的表面觸感粗糙

examples.sentence: He has a [rough] exterior but is kind inside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他外表粗魯，但內心善良

examples.sentence: The [rough] terrain was difficult to traverse.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 粗糙的地形難以穿越

meanings.meaning_en_US: A deep gorge, typically one with a river flowing through it.

examples.sentence: The [canyon] was formed over millions of years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個峽谷是在數百萬年內形成的

examples.sentence: We hiked down into the [canyon] to explore.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們爬下峽谷去探險

examples.sentence: The river flows through the [canyon].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 河流穿過這個峽谷

meanings.meaning_en_US: The part of a garment that covers the arm.

examples.sentence: She rolled up her [sleeve] to wash her hands.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她捲起袖子洗手。

examples.sentence: He has a tattoo on his [sleeve].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的袖子上有一個紋身。

examples.sentence: The dress has long [sleeves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件裙子有長袖子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or thing that cleans.

examples.sentence: The [cleaner] finished tidying up the office.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 清潔工完成了辦公室的整理工作。

examples.sentence: My [cleaner] comes every Friday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的清潔工每週五來。

examples.sentence: They hired a [cleaner] to help with the housework.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們雇了一名清潔工來幫助做家務。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An insect that is known for its distinctive chirping sound.

examples.sentence: The [cricket] chirped loudly in the evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蟋蟀在晚上大聲啼鳴

examples.sentence: We could hear the sound of [crickets] in the fields.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以聽到田野中的蟋蟀聲

examples.sentence: He caught a [cricket] while camping.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在露營時抓到了一隻蟋蟀

meanings.meaning_en_US: A popular sport played with a bat and ball, mainly in countries like England and Australia.

examples.sentence: They play [cricket] on weekends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們週末打板球

examples.sentence: The [cricket] match was thrilling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場板球比賽激烈

examples.sentence: He enjoys watching [cricket] games.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡觀看板球比賽

meanings.meaning_en_US: The central office or main location of an organization.

examples.sentence: The company's [headquarters] is located in New York.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司的總部位於紐約。

examples.sentence: All major decisions are made at the [headquarters].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 所有重大決策在總部制定。

examples.sentence: The team met at the [headquarters] for the briefing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊在總部會面進行簡報。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To take on or accept an idea, plan, or way of doing something.

examples.sentence: They decided to [adopt] a new policy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定採取新的政策

examples.sentence: He wants to [adopt] a child.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想收養一個孩子

examples.sentence: Many companies [adopt] new technologies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多公司採用新技術

meanings.meaning_en_US: Located on the outside or external part, or further away from the center.

examples.sentence: The [outer] layer of the cake is decorated with icing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蛋糕的外層用糖霜裝飾。

examples.sentence: The [outer] walls of the building are painted white.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該建築的外牆是白色的。

examples.sentence: We walked along the [outer] perimeter of the park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們沿著公園的外圍散步。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A plant that is grown in large quantities for food or other products.

examples.sentence: Farmers harvested the wheat [crop].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 農民收割了麥子農作物

examples.sentence: This region is known for its rice [crops].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地區以水稻農作物著稱

examples.sentence: They rotate their [crops] yearly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們每年輪作農作物

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cut or gather a crop or to shorten something.

examples.sentence: They need to [crop] the photos for the album.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們需要修剪照片以放進相簿

examples.sentence: He will [crop] his hair this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他這個周末要修剪頭髮

examples.sentence: She decided to [crop] the excess branches.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定修剪多餘的樹枝
